title.rendered: Software Development Apprenticeship at Fox Corporation, Bangalore [2024 Pass-out; Java; Python; JS]: Apply Now!

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for the Software Development Apprenticeship at Fox Corp, Bangalore. Check the eligibility and other details below!

About Fox

Under the FOX umbrella, the company produces and distributes content through some of the world’s most prominent and respected brands, such as FOX News Media, FOX Sports, FOX Entertainment, FOX Television Stations, and Tubi Media Group. They empower a diverse group of creators to conceive and develop culturally relevant content, while fostering an organization that thrives on creative ideas, operational expertise, and strategic vision.

FOX has long been a leader in news, sports, and entertainment programming, achieving substantial revenue growth and profitability in a challenging industry landscape in recent years. Moving forward, FOX plans to continue investing across its businesses, focusing resources on higher-growth initiatives, and seizing strategic opportunities across the various media sectors in which it operates.

Job Details

The company is seeking a motivated individual to join their team as a Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) Apprentice on a one-year contract. This is an excellent opportunity to launch a career in software testing and quality engineering. The role offers hands-on experience with cutting-edge technologies and the chance to contribute to the development of high-quality, reliable applications. As an SDET Apprentice, the individual will build skills in automation testing, scripting, and performance testing while collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure the successful delivery of flawless software solutions.

Responsibilities

  • Assist in the design, development, and execution of automated test scripts for web and mobile applications.
  • Contribute to creating and maintaining test plans, test cases, and test data for new and existing software applications.
  • Collaborate with development teams to understand software requirements and design efficient testing strategies.
  • Perform manual testing for scenarios that cannot be automated and report bugs and defects.
  • Help in the identification and troubleshooting of performance issues in applications.
  • Participate in code reviews to ensure testability and quality standards are met.
  • Contribute to the development of testing frameworks and tools for automating repetitive tasks.
  • Work closely with QA Engineers and developers to ensure comprehensive test coverage.
  • Engage in learning sessions to further enhance your technical and testing skills.
  • Provide regular updates to team leads and stakeholders about the status of testing efforts.

Qualifications

  • A Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or Computer Science (2024 graduates only).
  • Strong analytical, troubleshooting, and problem-solving abilities.
  • Proficiency in programming languages like Java, Python, or JavaScript.
  • Basic knowledge of test automation tools (e.g., Selenium, TestNG, JUnit) is desirable.
  • Familiarity with CI/CD workflows and tools (e.g., Jenkins, Git) is beneficial.
  • A solid understanding of the software development life cycle (SDLC) and testing practices.
  • Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
  • Ability to collaborate effectively in a team environment with a proactive attitude toward learning.
  • Strong attention to detail and a passion for ensuring quality.

How to Apply?

Interested and eligible candidates can apply via this link.

Location

Bangalore, Karnataka.

Benefits

  • This position offers a hybrid work model, providing flexibility between remote and in-office work.
  • Opportunity to work on real-world projects and contribute directly to high-impact software applications.
  • Gain valuable hands-on experience in automated and manual testing environments.
  • Learn and grow through mentorship, training, and exposure to industry best practices.
  • A collaborative and supportive work environment that encourages continuous learning and development.
